news_header: HK Foods is selling its Danish business for EUR 44.6 million, ending its operations in Denmark and previously abandoning Sweden.
news_text: HK Foods has decided to sell its Danish business for EUR 44.6 million, a deal that has been approved by the Danish Competition Authority and is expected to be finalized by the end of October. This sale will mark the end of HK Foods' operations in Denmark, following its previous abandonment of business in Sweden. The purpose of this transaction is to strengthen the company's balance sheet and concentrate on its remaining business operations.
